subject: Preakness Stakes
Horse Racing
lead_paragraph: Bernardini entered the second leg of the Triple Crown as something of an unknown, and he left it as a Preakness winner who was nearly forgotten as he galloped across the finish line.
snippet: Bernardini entered the second leg of the Triple Crown as something of an unknown, and he left it as a Preakness winner who was nearly forgotten as he galloped across the finish line.
